page.title: 03POINTS OF INTEREST
page.content: Behind Dunkirt barn there are some bee hives. There are to be found several disused chalk pits, the chalk from the pits was used to build the local houses. Game birds are bred in the plantations.In one of the plantations they have replaced the trees that have been taken out.It has been found that most of the trees in the area are evergeens . In the area are the remains of an old Roman road ,but nowadays it has been buried underneath the fields. A railway runs through the area . There are many fields in the area.They are large fields mostly containing wheat,corn,barley and oats. There is a water tower in the area. The chicken farm covers 37,267 square feet. In part of the area there is a hurdle
